sentences.sContent: Please remain vigilant at all times and report anything suspicious.
sentences.sCn: 请时刻保持警惕，有可疑情况随时报告。

synos.tran: 警惕的；警醒的；注意的；警戒的

remMethod.val: vig (生命) + il + ant → 生命诚可贵， 警惕病来袭 → 警惕着的

words.tran: 义务警员；治安维持会成员

trans.tranOther: giving careful attention to what is happening, so that you will notice any danger or illegal activity
